mapper.select: select cno, pno, pname, category, price, pimg from (select /*+INDEX(tbl_product pk_product)*/ rownum as rn, tc.cno as cno, tp.pno as pno, pname as pname,category as category, price as price, pimg as pimg from tbl_product tp INNER JOIN TBL_CART tc ON tp.PNO = tc.PNO WHERE tc.mno = #{mno} and rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount}
select sizename from tbl_size where price=#{price}
select count(cno) from tbl_cart where mno=#{mno}
